name: react-redux-express-template
description: scripts for react redux express app generator
author: chad garland

scripts.start: npm run web & npm run server
scripts.web: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react babel-preset-stage-0 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy ] ] web/src/index.js -o web/public/bundle.js -v
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react babel-preset-stage-0 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy ] ] web/src/index.js -o web/public/bundle.js
scripts.prod: npm run build | uglifyjs -mc warnings=false > web/public/bundle.js
